title: Science Problem-Solving Projects Utilizing Design Studios

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Scientific Concepts and Digital Device Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining collaborative and experiential activities, focusing on adult learners solving everyday science problems through design thinking

learning_goals: Learners can analyze science-based real-life problems using the design thinking process and create prototypes of three or more solutions
Learners can collaborate with 4–5 team members to improve project deliverables through two or more feedback cycles
Learners can document the project process in portfolio format and deliver a 10-minute oral presentation at the final showcase

resources: Digital Design Software (Adobe XD, Figma, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
